summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Seattle Public Utilities; authorizing the grant of an easement to the City of Renton, Washington for access across a portion of The City of Seattle's East Side Supply Line right- of-way; and authorizing the acceptance of an easement from Shadow Hawk, L.L.C. to The City of Seattle for permanent access rights to such right-of-way, both easements located in Section 21, Township 23 North, Range 5 East, W.M, King County, Washington.
